item.title: Santa
item.description: With Christmas fast approaching, We have a resident Santa visit the children on Christmas Eve, with each child receiving either a: Selection Box Soft Toy Cancelled Unfortunately due to advice we are advised that it is “ill advised” for Santa to call to houses in Whitehall and Daingean Road.
